title: Trading Mining Proposal
body:
After considering the suggestions from the community, SwapX will launch a transaction mining (trans-mining) program to increase the LP Liquidity Provider's fee income through transaction.  The reward for trans-mining will be charged to the unreleased SWP from the LP Staking farming.

Details
1.  24,000 SWP will be rewarded to trading-farming participants on a daily basis.
2.  Only SWP-USDT pool has trans-mining incentives. 
3.  Only SWP buy-side orders have incentives -> SWAP USDT for SWP.
4.  Rules
a. Rewards will be distributed based on the trade volume proportion.
b. Rewards Cumulation Period: every 24h, starting from 12:00am (EST) to next day at 12:00am (EST).
c. Rewards Distribution Time: 12:30am-1:00am (EST)

5.  Tips: for non SWP-USDT pools (such as ETH-SWP), no rewards will be given.
6.  The usage of left SWP from trans-mining will be determined through community voting

Please vote on the following link to determine the duration of the trans-mining program
author: 0xc1aD7FE67D08a93Ac5f13278086ba72E90EfCD48
